description: Maltese crunchy biscuits with a strong taste of almonds
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Traditional Kwarezimal Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the eggs with the orange juice, zest and vanilla essence.
Add the sugar to the mixing bowl and combine fully.
Incrementally add the ground almonds while mixing and then add the chopped almonds and mixed spice.
Divide the dough into 6 and shape into a log form and place evenly spaced on a baking tray.
Bake in the oven for 13 minutes, then remove and allow to cool slightly before coating with maple syrup. All to cool before serving.
